scripts.build:wasm: cd src/rust_audio && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cd ../.. && wasm-bindgen src/rust_audio/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/tiramisu_audio_analyzer.wasm --out-dir ./src/wasm --target nodejs
scripts.dev:editor: bun run build:editor && bun run examples/serve.ts
scripts.dev:upload: bun run build:upload && bun run examples/serve.ts
scripts.dev:audio-overlay: bun run build:audio-overlay && bun run examples/serve.ts
scripts.dev:split-screen: bun run build:split-screen && bun run examples/serve.ts
scripts.dev:mask: bun run build:mask && bun run examples/serve.ts
scripts.dev:snow: bun run build:snow && bun run examples/serve.ts
scripts.build:visualizer: bun run build:wasm && bun build ./examples/music-visualizer/app.ts --target browser --outfile ./examples/music-visualizer/bundle.js $BASE_EXTERNAL
scripts.dev:visualizer: bun run build:visualizer && bun run examples/serve.ts
scripts.dev:meme: bun run build:meme && bun run examples/serve.ts
